books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams
books.description: A humorous science‑fiction adventure following an ordinary man through absurd and unexpected cosmic events.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A classic romantic novel exploring love, class, and misunderstandings in 19th‑century England.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian story about totalitarian control, surveillance, and the loss of individual freedom.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A powerful novel about racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A tragic tale of wealth, ambition, and lost love during the Jazz Age.

books.title: Moby Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: An epic sea story about obsession and revenge centered on a legendary white whale.

books.title: War and Peace
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.description: A sweeping historical novel that weaves together personal lives and major events during the Napoleonic Wars.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A fantasy epic about the struggle between good and evil in a richly imagined world.

books.title: Crime and Punishment
books.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
books.description: A psychological novel exploring guilt, morality, and redemption after a troubled man commits a crime.

books.title: Don Quixote
books.author: Miguel de Cervantes
books.description: A comedic and philosophical tale of a man who believes he is a knight on a quest for honor.
